subject: Interview With Joe Cioppi
author: ghuny1
full_text:
Join us and meet the wonderful creator of the "Joe's Box" Joe Cioppi
and Our First real International Interview with Javier Oachoa of
Contacto Mistico in Monterrey, Mexico. A Translator has been provided.
Listen to the cultures and ideas from Joe and Javier himself as they
discuss between each other about communicating with the dead.

http://www.archive.org/details/InterviewWithJoeCioppiAndJavierOchoa
